entries.name: Feature: Snivelling Grot
entries: You're nothing special.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak Goblin. If your starting Intelligence score, determined by your base Intelligence plus your racial bonus, is 13 or higher, you can also read and write Goblin.

entries.name: Furious Hammering
entries: When you use Fury of the Small, the creature must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. The DC for the saving throw is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier.

entries.name: Thick Hide
entries: You gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak Goblin. If your starting Intelligence score, determined by your base Intelligence plus your racial bonus, is 13 or higher, you can also read and write Goblin.

entries.name: Frenetic
entries: You may use your Nimble Escape without expending a bonus action.

entries.name: Skittering
entries: You have a crawling speed equal to your walking speed.

entries.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If you hit a creature with an attack roll, the creature takes an extra {@damage 2d6} damage if it hasn't taken a turn yet in the current combat.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak Goblin. If your starting Intelligence score, determined by your base Intelligence plus your racial bonus, is 13 or higher, you can also read and write Goblin.

entries.name: You First
entries: As a bonus action, you give one ally you can see within 30 feet advantage on the next attack roll they make before the start of your next turn. If the ally hits with that attack, you gain advantage on all attack rolls until the end of your next turn. If the ally misses with that attack, you have disadvantage on all attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Sixth Sense
entries: You can't be surprised while you are conscious. Additionally, you have proficiency in the {@skill Perception} skill.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak Goblin. If your starting Intelligence score, determined by your base Intelligence plus your racial bonus, is 13 or higher, you can also read and write Goblin.

entries.name: Barbed Tongue
entries: When an ally within 30 feet of you that can hear you make an attack roll, an ability check, or a saving throw, you can use your reaction to deal {@damage 1d4} psychic damage to them. That ally then adds double that amount to the result of their roll.
You can use this feature after the ally rolls their {@dice d20}, but before the outcome is determined.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Menacing
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Intimidation} skill. Additionally, when you would roll a Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) check with disadvantage, you roll as though you have neither disadvantage nor advantage.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak Goblin. If your starting Intelligence score, determined by your base Intelligence plus your racial bonus, is 13 or higher, you can also read and write Goblin.

entries.name: Warped Magiks
entries: When you cast a spell which affects an area, you may double the dimensions of that area, provided no dimension exceeds 100 feet before doubling. For example, a 20-foot-radius sphere would be doubled to a 40-foot-radius sphere; a line 30 feet long and 5 feet wide would be doubled to a line 60 feet long and 10 feet wide.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Twisted Form
entries: The touch of another plane has left you physically altered or disfigured in some way (for example, you may have strangely coloured and patterned skin, or a pair of antlers, or a forked tail). You have disadvantage on Charisma checks to interact with other goblinoids, who distrust and avoid you.

entries.name: Wyrdo
entries: Whatever touched you left a deep imprint on your tiny mind. You {@i know} things; things no self-respecting goblin has any business knowing. When you succeed on an Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}, {@skill History}, or {@skill Religion}) check, the DM may choose to award you with additional information based on your otherworldly intuitions and subconscious impressions.
